channel.title: HOLP 3 Discussion
channel.description: Talk about the HOLP 3 Map Pack

item.title: Big fans of HOLP maps
item.author: invalid@example.com (FnAgaming)
item.dc:creator: FnAgaming
item.content:encoded:
Just wanted to give the authors of the custom content within the HOLP map pack huge props. Everyone @ fnagaming loves the maps.





EDIT: Just spoke with Slainchild and have his permission to host his content !! Between his and Haley's maps we are set! I'll post here when we start using the maps in tourneys.

THANKS A MILLION - HOLP ROCKS !!!!!!!!

item.title: HOLP3 Volume 2 Released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cr4zyB4st4rd)
item.dc:creator: Cr4zyB4st4rd
item.content:encoded:
[screenshot]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v497/Slainchild/HOLPLogo.png[/screenshot]​

The aim of HOLP is to provide Unreal Tournament 3 levels with high quality gameplay and performance, and oldskool UT visuals. This pack is not meant to rival the graphics found in the retail UT3 levels, using limited bloom, normal maps and clutter.

HOLP3 Volume 2 contains the following 12 maps for UT3:

CTF-Compression by Sjosz (8 - 10 players)...​

HOLP3 Volume 2 Released!

item.title: HOLP3 Volume 1 Released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Slainchild)
item.dc:creator: Slainchild
item.content:encoded:
[screenshot]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v497/Slainchild/HOLPLogo.png[/screenshot]​

The aim of HOLP is to provide Unreal Tournament 3 levels with high quality gameplay and performance, and oldskool UT visuals. This pack is not meant to rival the graphics found in the retail UT3 levels, using limited bloom, normal maps and clutter.

HOLP3 Volume 1 contains the following maps for UT3:

DM-Eluded by Ricco "BradPitt" "vybz" Sobers (2-4 Players)...​

HOLP3 Volume 1 Released!

item.title: Weekly HOLP Night
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hazel.H)
item.dc:creator: Hazel.H
item.content:encoded:
Shortly before the release of HOLP3, Cr4zyb4st4rd kindly set up two servers for us at Multiplay.co.uk, running only the HOLP maps. We had some great games just after the release, but since then the servers have been pretty empty. So, what to do with two servers and a bunch of maps?

Starting this Friday, we'd like to invite you to join us for an oldskool fragfest on the servers. Everyone is welcome, it doesn't matter how good you are at the game, just come and have fun! The first one...

Weekly HOLP Night

item.title: HOLP3 - Coming Soon!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Slainchild)
item.dc:creator: Slainchild
item.content:encoded:
The HOLP team is pleased to announce the next installment in the HOLP series - HOLP3!

We've been hard at work for the past few months pulling these maps together and we hope you like them. Here are some new screenshots of some of the maps that will be included this time around. Enjoy.

[SCREENSHOT]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v497/Slainchild/HOLPLogo.png[/SCREENSHOT]

DM-Azul by HazelH
[SCREENSHOT]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v497/Slainchild/Azul.jpg[/SCREENSHOT]...​

HOLP3 - Coming Soon!
